00042 SelfDoc CNReferenceMethodPDNN::explainSelf() 
00043         {

00045         SelfDoc doc;
00046         doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00047         doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00048         doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00049         return doc;
00050         }

00066 /**
00067  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00068  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00069  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00070  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00071  *
00072  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00073  *
00074  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00075  */
00076 SelfCreate * CNReferenceMethodPDNN::newObject(
00077         std::map<std::string,std::string>& params) 
00078         {
00079         SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00080         std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00081         CNReferenceMethodPDNN* pMethod = new CNReferenceMethodPDNN();
00082         std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00083         
00084         return pMethod;
00085         }

00101 /**
00102  * @brief Run the calculations.
00103  */
00104 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::run()
00105 {
00106         AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-output");
00107         AffxString strProbeFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("probe-file");
00108         Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodPDNN::run(...) start");
00109         AffxArray<PDNNProbe> vPDNNProbes;
00110         loadProbes(strReferenceFileName, strProbeFileName, vPDNNProbes);
00111 
00112         for (unsigned int uiProbeLength = 2; (uiProbeLength <= 100); uiProbeLength++)
00113         {
00114                 int iPopulationSize = 0;
00115                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vPDNNProbes.getCount()); iIndex++)
00116                 {
00117                         PDNNProbe* p = vPDNNProbes.getAt(iIndex);
00118                         if (p->Sequence.length() == uiProbeLength) {iPopulationSize++;}
00119                 }
00120                 if (iPopulationSize > (uiProbeLength - 1))
00121                 {
00122                         // Load up the population.
00123                         AffxArray<PDNNProbe> vProbes;
00124                         vProbes.resize(iPopulationSize);
00125                         int i = 0;
00126                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vPDNNProbes.getCount()); iIndex++)
00127                         {
00128                                 PDNNProbe* p = vPDNNProbes.getAt(iIndex);
00129                                 if (p->Sequence.length() == uiProbeLength) {vProbes[i] = p; i++;}
00130                         }
00131                         int iSampleSize = Min(200000, iPopulationSize);
00132                         std::vector<int> vProbeIndexes;
00133                         getRandomSample(iPopulationSize, iSampleSize, vProbeIndexes);
00134                         ColumnVector vPopulationIntensities(iPopulationSize);
00135                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<char> mxPopulationDinucleotideTypes(iPopulationSize, (uiProbeLength - 1));
00136                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iPopulationSize); iIndex++)
00137                         {
00138                                 PDNNProbe* p = vProbes.getAt(iIndex);
00139                                 vPopulationIntensities.element(iIndex) = log(p->MedianIntensity);
00140                                 for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < (uiProbeLength - 1)); iBaseIndex++)
00141                                 {
00142                                         mxPopulationDinucleotideTypes.set(iIndex, iBaseIndex, getDinucleotideType(p->Sequence.charAt(iBaseIndex), p->Sequence.charAt(iBaseIndex + 1)));
00143                                 }
00144                         }
00145 
00146                         // Load up the sampled data
00147                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<char> mxSampledDinucleotideTypes(iSampleSize, (uiProbeLength - 1));
00148                         ColumnVector vSampledIntensities(iSampleSize);
00149 //                      Verbose::out(1, "*");
00150                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vProbeIndexes.size()); iIndex++)
00151                         {
00152                                 int iProbeIndex = vProbeIndexes[iIndex];
00153                                 PDNNProbe* p = vProbes.getAt(iProbeIndex);
00154 //                              Verbose::out(1, "PDNN Random Sample ProbeID = " + ToStr(p->ProbeID));
00155                                 vSampledIntensities(iIndex + 1) = log(p->MedianIntensity);
00156                                 for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < (uiProbeLength - 1)); iBaseIndex++)
00157                                 {
00158                                         mxSampledDinucleotideTypes.set(iIndex, iBaseIndex, getDinucleotideType(p->Sequence.charAt(iBaseIndex), p->Sequence.charAt(iBaseIndex + 1)));
00159                                 }
00160                         }
00161 //                      Verbose::out(1, "*");
00162 
00163                         // Initialize the run
00164                         ColumnVector vInitialEnergy(10);
00165                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < 10); iIndex++) {vInitialEnergy[iIndex] = 0.1;}
00166                         ColumnVector vEnergy = vInitialEnergy;
00167                         ColumnVector vPrevEnergy = vInitialEnergy;
00168 
00169                         ColumnVector vInitialWeights(uiProbeLength - 1);
00170                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (uiProbeLength - 1)); iIndex++) {vInitialWeights[iIndex] = (1.0 / (double)(uiProbeLength - 1));}
00171                         ColumnVector vWeights = vInitialWeights;
00172                         ColumnVector vPrevWeights = vInitialWeights;
00173                         
00174                         double dPrevFit = 1;
00175                         double dTOL = 1e-2;
00176 
00177                         Matrix X, U, V; DiagonalMatrix S;
00178 
00179                         // Run to convergence
00180                         for (int iIteration = 1; (iIteration <= 10); iIteration++)
00181                         {
00182                                 X.ReSize(iSampleSize, 10);
00183                                 for (int iSampleIndex = 0; (iSampleIndex < iSampleSize); iSampleIndex++)
00184                                 {
00185                                         for (int iDinucleotideType = 1; (iDinucleotideType <= 10); iDinucleotideType++)
00186                                         {
00187                                                 double dSum = 0;
00188                                                 for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < (uiProbeLength - 1)); iBaseIndex++)
00189                                                 {
00190                                                         if (mxSampledDinucleotideTypes.get(iSampleIndex, iBaseIndex) == iDinucleotideType)
00191                                                         {
00192                                                                 dSum += vWeights[iBaseIndex];
00193                                                         }
00194                                                 }
00195                                                 X((iSampleIndex + 1), iDinucleotideType) = dSum;
00196                                         }
00197                                 }
00198                                 svd(X, S, U, V, vSampledIntensities, vEnergy);
00199                                 X.ReSize(iSampleSize, (uiProbeLength - 1));
00200                                 for (int iSampleIndex = 0; (iSampleIndex < iSampleSize); iSampleIndex++)
00201                                 {
00202                                         for (int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < (uiProbeLength - 1)); iBaseIndex++)
00203                                         {
00204                                                 X(iSampleIndex + 1, iBaseIndex + 1) = vEnergy(mxSampledDinucleotideTypes.get(iSampleIndex, iBaseIndex));
00205                                         }
00206                                 }
00207                                 svd(X, S, U, V, vSampledIntensities, vWeights);
00208                                 CNAnalysisMethod::memory("CNReferenceMethodPDNN::run(...)");
00209                                 flipSignIfNeeded(vWeights, vEnergy, X);
00210                                 if (hasConverged(uiProbeLength, iIteration, vSampledIntensities, X, vEnergy, vPrevEnergy, vWeights, vPrevWeights, dPrevFit, dTOL)) {break;}
00211                         }
00212 
00213                         // Calculate Predicted Intensities
00214                         ColumnVector vPredictedIntensities(iPopulationSize);
00215                         for (int k = 1; (k <= iPopulationSize); k++)
00216                         {
00217                                 vPredictedIntensities(k) = 0;
00218                                 for (int j = 1; (j <= (uiProbeLength - 1)); j++)
00219                                 {
00220                                         vPredictedIntensities(k) += (vEnergy(mxPopulationDinucleotideTypes.get((k - 1), (j - 1))) * vWeights(j));
00221                                         vProbes.getAt(k - 1)->PredictedIntensity = exp(vPredictedIntensities(k));
00222                                 }
00223                         }
00224 
00225                         // Calculate statistics
00226                         ColumnVector v = (vPopulationIntensities - vPredictedIntensities);
00227                         double dSSE = 0;
00228                         for (int i = 1; (i <= v.Nrows()); i++)
00229                         {
00230                                 dSSE += v(i) * v(i);
00231                         }
00232                         double dSSTO = var(vPopulationIntensities) * (iPopulationSize - 1);
00233                         double dR2 = 1.0 - dSSE / dSSTO;
00234                         double dOverallFit = corr(vPopulationIntensities, vPredictedIntensities);
00235                         Verbose::out(1, "PDNN Model Fit\tProbeLength = " + ToStr(uiProbeLength) + "\tR2 = " + ToStr(dR2) + "\tOverallFit = " + ToStr(dOverallFit));
00236                         vProbes.nullAll();
00237                 }
00238         }
00239         updateReference(strReferenceFileName, vPDNNProbes);
00240 
00241         m_pEngine->setOpt("pdnn-reference-values-exist","true");
00242 
00243         vPDNNProbes.deleteAll();
00244         Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodPDNN::run(...) end");
00245 }
00246 
00247 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::loadProbes( const std::string& strReferenceFileName, 
00248                                         const std::string& strProbeFileName, 
00249                                         AffxArray<PDNNProbe>& vPDNNProbes)
00250 {
00251   affx::File5_File file5;
00252   affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00253   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00254 
00255   int iCount=0;
00256   if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
00257     {
00258       iCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "Cyto2", "ProbeEffects");
00259       file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00260       group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00261       tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ProbeEffects", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00262 
00263     }
00264   else
00265     {
00266       iCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "CN5", "CN5.plier.feature-response");
00267       file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00268       group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00269       tsv5 = group5->openTsv("CN5.plier.feature-response", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00270     }
00271   if (iCount <= 0) {throw(Except("Cannot find any probes in the CN reference file to process."));}
00272 
00273   vPDNNProbes.reserve(iCount);
00274   int i = 0;
00275   double d = 0;
00276   float f = 0;
00277   while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00278     {
00279       PDNNProbe* p = new PDNNProbe;
00280       tsv5->get(0, 0, &i); p->ProbeID = i;
00281       tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->ProbeEffect = d;
00282       tsv5->get(0, 2, &i); p->ProbeSetIndex = i;
00283       tsv5->get(0, 3, &i); p->Allele = (char)i;
00284       tsv5->get(0, 4, &f); p->MedianIntensity = f;
00285       vPDNNProbes.add(p);
00286     }
00287   tsv5->close();
00288   delete tsv5;
00289 
00290   group5->close();
00291   delete group5;
00292   file5.close();
00293 
00294   vPDNNProbes.quickSort(0);
00295 
00296   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00297   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00298         
00299   AffxString strSequence;
00300   PDNNProbe objSearch;
00301 
00302   int iXCount = m_pEngine->getOptInt("num-cols");
00303   int iYCount = m_pEngine->getOptInt("num-rows");
00304   m_pEngine->setOpt("array-size", ToStr(iYCount));
00305 
00306   std::string strX, strY;
00307   tsv.open(strProbeFileName);
00308   tsv.bind(0,1,&strX, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00309   tsv.bind(0,2,&strY, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00310   tsv.bind(0,4,&strSequence, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00311         
00312   while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK){
00313     int x = AffxByteArray(strX).parseInt();
00314     int y = AffxByteArray(strY).parseInt();
00315     if (x >= m_pEngine->getOptInt("num-cols")) {continue;}
00316     if (y >= m_pEngine->getOptInt("num-rows")) {continue;}
00317     strSequence = strSequence.reverse();
00318     switch(strSequence.length()) {
00319     case 23: strSequence = "AT" + strSequence; break;
00320     case 50: strSequence = strSequence.substring(1, strSequence.length()); break;
00321     case 48: strSequence = "A" + strSequence; break;
00322     case 47: strSequence = "AT" + strSequence; break;
00323     case 46: strSequence = "ATG" + strSequence; break;
00324     case 44: strSequence = "A" + strSequence; break;
00325     case 43: strSequence = "AT" + strSequence; break;
00326     case 42: strSequence = "ATG" + strSequence; break;
00327     case 41: strSequence = "ATGC" + strSequence; break;
00328     case 39: strSequence = "A" + strSequence; break;
00329     case 38: strSequence = "AT" + strSequence; break;
00330     }
00331     objSearch.ProbeID = y * iYCount + x + 1; // Using iYCount intentionally, because X does not cover the whole array.
00332     int iSearchIndex = vPDNNProbes.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00333     if (iSearchIndex != -1)   {
00334       PDNNProbe* p = vPDNNProbes.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00335       p->Sequence = strSequence;
00336     }
00337 
00338   }
00339   tsv.clear();
00340 }
00341 
00342 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::getRandomSample(int iPopulationSize, int iSampleSize, std::vector<int>& vRandomSample)
00343 {
00344         vRandomSample.clear();
00345         MTRand mt(5489);
00346         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iSampleSize); iIndex++)
00347         {
00348                 int i = mt.randInt(iPopulationSize - 1);
00349                 bool bAlreadyUsed = false;
00350                 for (int j = 0; (j < vRandomSample.size()); j++)
00351                 {
00352                         if (i == vRandomSample[j]) {bAlreadyUsed = true; break;}
00353                 }
00354                 if (bAlreadyUsed) {iIndex--; continue;}
00355                 vRandomSample.push_back(i);
00356         }
00357         std::sort(vRandomSample.begin(), vRandomSample.end());
00358 }
00359 
00360 char CNReferenceMethodPDNN::getDinucleotideType(char c1, char c2)
00361 {
00362         if ((c1 == 'A') && (c2 == 'A')) {return 1;}
00363         else if ((c1 == 'T') && (c2 == 'T')) {return 1;}
00364         else if ((c1 == 'A') && (c2 == 'T')) {return 2;}
00365         else if ((c1 == 'A') && (c2 == 'G')) {return 3;}
00366         else if ((c1 == 'C') && (c2 == 'T')) {return 3;}
00367         else if ((c1 == 'A') && (c2 == 'C')) {return 4;}
00368         else if ((c1 == 'G') && (c2 == 'T')) {return 4;}
00369         else if ((c1 == 'T') && (c2 == 'A')) {return 5;}
00370         else if ((c1 == 'T') && (c2 == 'G')) {return 6;}
00371         else if ((c1 == 'C') && (c2 == 'A')) {return 6;}
00372         else if ((c1 == 'T') && (c2 == 'C')) {return 7;}
00373         else if ((c1 == 'G') && (c2 == 'A')) {return 7;}
00374         else if ((c1 == 'G') && (c2 == 'G')) {return 8;}
00375         else if ((c1 == 'C') && (c2 == 'C')) {return 8;}
00376         else if ((c1 == 'G') && (c2 == 'C')) {return 9;}
00377         else if ((c1 == 'C') && (c2 == 'G')) {return 10;}
00378         else return 0;
00379 }
00380 
00381 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::svd(        Matrix& mxX, 
00382                                         DiagonalMatrix& mxDiagonal, 
00383                                         Matrix& mxU, 
00384                                         Matrix& mxV, 
00385                                         Matrix& mxData, 
00386                                         ColumnVector& vResult)
00387 {
00388         SVD(mxX,mxDiagonal,mxU,mxV);
00389         invertDiagonal(mxDiagonal);
00390         vResult = mxV * mxDiagonal * mxU.t() * mxData;
00391 }
00392 
00393 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::invertDiagonal(DiagonalMatrix& mxDiagonal)
00394 {
00395         DiagonalMatrix mxTemp = mxDiagonal;
00396         for (int x = 0; ( x < mxTemp.Ncols()); x++)
00397         {
00398                 for (int y = 0; (y < mxTemp.Nrows()); y++)
00399                 {
00400                         if (x == y) 
00401                         {
00402                                 double d = 1.0 / mxTemp.element(y, x);
00403                                 if (fabs(d) > 1e6) {d = 0;}
00404                                 mxDiagonal(y + 1, x + 1) = d;
00405                         }
00406                 }
00407         }
00408 }
00409 
00410 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::flipSignIfNeeded(ColumnVector& vWeights, ColumnVector& vEnergy, Matrix& X)
00411 {
00412         int iSum = 0;
00413         for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < vWeights.Nrows()); iElementIndex++)
00414         {
00415                 if (vWeights.element(iElementIndex) < 0) {iSum++;}
00416         }
00417         if (iSum > (vWeights.Nrows() / 2.0))
00418         {
00419                 for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < vWeights.Nrows()); iElementIndex++)
00420                 {
00421                         vWeights.element(iElementIndex) *= -1;
00422                 }
00423                 for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < vEnergy.Nrows()); iElementIndex++)
00424                 {
00425                         vEnergy.element(iElementIndex) *= -1;
00426                 }
00427                 for (int y = 0; (y < X.Nrows()); y++)
00428                 {
00429                         for (int x = 0; (x < X.Ncols()); x++)
00430                         {
00431                                 X.element(y, x) *= -1;
00432                         }
00433                 }
00434         }
00435 }
00436 
00437 bool CNReferenceMethodPDNN::hasConverged(       unsigned int uiProbeLength, 
00438                                                 int iIteration, 
00439                                                 ColumnVector& vSampledIntensities, 
00440                                                 Matrix& X, 
00441                                                 ColumnVector& vEnergy, 
00442                                                 ColumnVector& vPrevEnergy, 
00443                                                 ColumnVector& vWeights, 
00444                                                 ColumnVector& vPrevWeights, 
00445                                                 double& dPrevFit, 
00446                                                 double dTOL)
00447 {
00448         bool bConverged = false;
00449         Matrix mx = X * vWeights;
00450         double dFit = corr(vSampledIntensities, mx);
00451         mx = vEnergy - vPrevEnergy;
00452         double delta1 = norm(mx);
00453         mx = vWeights - vPrevWeights;
00454         double delta2 = norm(mx);
00455         double delta3 = fabs(dPrevFit - dFit);
00456 
00457         //Verbose::out(1, "ProbeLength = " + ToStr(uiProbeLength) + "\tInteration = " + ToStr(iIteration) + "\tEnergyDelta = " + ::getDouble(delta1, 10) + "\tWeightsDelta = " + ::getDouble(delta2, 10) + "\tfit = " + ToStr(dFit));
00458         if ((delta3 < dTOL) || ((delta1 < dTOL) && (delta2 < dTOL)))
00459         {
00460                 //Verbose::out(1, "ProbeLength = " + ToStr(uiProbeLength) + "\tMethod has converged. TOL = " + ToStr(dTOL));
00461                 bConverged = true;
00462         }
00463         else
00464         {
00465                 vPrevWeights = vWeights;
00466                 vPrevEnergy = vEnergy;
00467                 dPrevFit = dFit;
00468         }
00469         return bConverged;
00470 }
00471 
00472 void CNReferenceMethodPDNN::updateReference(const std::string& strReferenceFileName, AffxArray<PDNNProbe>& vPDNNProbes)
00473 {
00474 
00475         affx::File5_File file5;
00476         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00477         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00478         file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00479 
00480         if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
00481         {
00482                 group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00483                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ProbeEffects", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00484 
00485         }
00486         else
00487         {
00488                 group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00489                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("CN5.plier.feature-response", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00490         }
00491         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probe_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00492         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "feature_response", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00493         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "ProbeSetIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00494         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "AlleleCode", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00495         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "MedianNormalizedIntensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00496         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "PredictedIntensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00497         //tsv5->gotoLine(0);
00498         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vPDNNProbes.getCount()); iIndex++)
00499         {
00500                 PDNNProbe* p = vPDNNProbes.getAt(iIndex);
00501                 tsv5->set_i(0, 0, p->ProbeID);
00502                 tsv5->set_d(0, 1, p->ProbeEffect);
00503                 tsv5->set_i(0, 2, p->ProbeSetIndex);
00504                 tsv5->set_i(0, 3, (int)p->Allele);
00505                 tsv5->set_f(0, 4, p->MedianIntensity);
00506 
00507                 tsv5->set_f(0, 5, p->PredictedIntensity);
00508                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00509         }
00510 
00511         tsv5->close();
00512         delete tsv5;
00513         group5->close();
00514         delete group5;
00515         file5.close();
00516 }
